page.title: 16Recreation.
page.content: The most popular sport in this area is football.There are many football teams in this area.Another popular sport is shinty.Badminton is played in the Village Hall. Also in the Village Hall there is playgroup,W.R.I(Womens Rural Institute),Youth Club,Choir and in the School Hall there is keep fit.Boys under sixteen in Kyleakin play in a Youth League.They also play for a cup called the Gaeltic Cup.Some girls in Kyleakin that go to Portree High School play for a hockey team.There are many hockey teams that come from Portree.
